annotations.description: The Ghost of Black's beach is an original creation of the now defunct San Diego Tiki spot The Cat Eye Club. I really don't want to spoil the history here, so...
annotations.title: The Strange Tale Of The Ghost of Black's Beach

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Jamaican Rum
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
.375oz (11ml) Velvet Falernum
.375oz (11ml) Benedictine
Pineapple Frond Garnish

Whip shake and pack with crushed ice in a rocks glass. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FbBhiSI3q-o
title: The Ghost of Black's Beach
